ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Many datasets and a set of graphics (based on ggplot2), statistics, effect sizes and hypothesis tests are provided for analysing paired data with S4 class.
Many datasets and a set of graphics (based on ggplot2), statistics, effect sizes and hypothesis tests are provided for analysing paired data with S4 class.

name: r-paireddata
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '1.1.1' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-paireddata
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/PairedData_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/PairedData/PairedData_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: b8e45503734eae1893a50cd0ae60b0a41fcb90f28138a61605d7f1e94873c51f

build:
  number: 5
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-mass
    - r-ggplot2
    - r-gld
    - r-lattice
    - r-mvtnorm
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-mass
    - r-ggplot2
    - r-gld
    - r-lattice
    - r-mvtnorm

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('PairedData')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('PairedData')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=PairedData
  license: GPL-2.0-only
  summary: Many datasets and a set of graphics (based on ggplot2), statistics, effect sizes and
    hypothesis tests are provided for analysing paired data with S4 class.
  license_family: GPL2
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: PairedData
# Type: Package
# Title: Paired Data Analysis
# Version: 1.1.1
# Date: 2018-06-02
# Author: Stephane Champely <champely@univ-lyon1.fr>
# Maintainer: Stephane Champely <champely@univ-lyon1.fr>
# Description: Many datasets and a set of graphics (based on ggplot2), statistics, effect sizes and hypothesis tests are provided for analysing paired data with S4 class.
# License: GPL (>= 2)
# Depends: methods,graphics,MASS,gld,mvtnorm,lattice,ggplot2
# Collate: global1.R ClassP1.R
# Packaged: 2018-06-02 14:53:04 UTC; STEPHANE.CHAMPELY
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2018-06-02 22:57:15 UTC
